## Course Purpose

- Master the grip of Theory of Estimation

- Appreciate the properties of point and interval estimators

- Gain knowledge on methods of estimation

## Course Learning Outcomes

- At the end of this purpose learners should be able to:

  * State clearly a parameter space and family of distribution
  * Verify for different families of distributions known properties of point estimators
  * Carry out estimation based on method of moments
  * Perform estimation based on the method of MLE
  * Do calculation based on interval estimation
